metadata.title: CVE-2018-14424 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The daemon in GDM through 3.29.1 does not properly unexport display objects from its D-Bus interface when they are destroyed, which allows a local attacker to trigger a use-after-free via a specially crafted sequence of D-Bus method calls, resulting in a denial of service or potential code execution.

criterions.comment: gdm3 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.29.91-1ubuntu1').
